trans-unit.source: Converts an expression into an HWND handle.

seg-source.mrk: Converts an expression into an HWND handle.

target.mrk: Converts an expression into an HWND handle.

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: An expression to convert into an HWND handle.

seg-source.mrk: An expression to convert into an HWND handle.

target.mrk: An expression to convert into an HWND handle.

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: If the value can be converted to an HWND, the HWND representation will be returned.

seg-source.mrk: If the value can be converted to an HWND, the HWND representation will be returned.

target.mrk: If the value can be converted to an HWND, the HWND representation will be returned.

trans-unit.source: If the HWND does not denote a valid window, a 0 (NULL) HWND will be returned and sets the @error flag to 1.

seg-source.mrk: If the HWND does not denote a valid window, a 0 (NULL) HWND will be returned and sets the @error flag to 1.

target.mrk: If the HWND does not denote a valid window, a 0 (NULL) HWND will be returned and sets the @error flag to 1.

seg-source.mrk: Remarks

target.mrk: Remarks

trans-unit.source: Double numbers can not be converted to an HWND.

seg-source.mrk: Double numbers can not be converted to an HWND.

target.mrk: Double numbers can not be converted to an HWND.

trans-unit.source: No literal string should be converted to an HWND because there is no guarantee that a given window will have the same HWND ever again. This is not strictly forbidden, but it is a programming mistake and should be avoided.

seg-source.mrk: No literal string should be converted to an HWND because there is no guarantee that a given window will have the same HWND ever again.
This is not strictly forbidden, but it is a programming mistake and should be avoided.

target.mrk: No literal string should be converted to an HWND because there is no guarantee that a given window will have the same HWND ever again.
This is not strictly forbidden, but it is a programming mistake and should be avoided.
